title: Landing Page Load and Content Verification
description: Verify that the landing page loads successfully and displays mental health statistics, platform overview, and navigation links.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page URL.
Verify the page loads with HTTP 200 status.
Verify presence of mental health statistics section.
Verify platform overview text is displayed.
Verify navigation links to chat, appointments, resources, forum, and dashboard are present.

title: Anonymous AI Chatbot Normal Flow
description: Test that a student can send a message to the AI chatbot and receive a relevant response with session persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to the anonymous chat interface.
Send an initial message to the chatbot without a session ID.
Verify chatbot returns a valid response text, a session ID, and no crisis detection for normal query.
Send a follow-up message with the received session ID.
Verify chatbot continues the conversation and maintains context associated with the session ID.

title: AI Chatbot Crisis Detection and Suggested Action
description: Verify that the AI chatbot detects crisis keywords and suggests appropriate actions like booking appointment or counseling.

steps.description: Send a message containing crisis indicators (e.g., suicidal thoughts) to the chatbot.
Verify chatbot response flags crisis_detected as true.
Verify suggested_action field contains either 'book_appointment' or 'suggest_counseling'.
Verify response timestamp is valid and matches the message sent time.

title: Login Functionality - Successful Authentication
description: Verify that admin/counselor users can login with valid credentials and are redirected to the dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username and password.
Submit the login form.
Verify redirection to dashboard page.

title: Login Functionality - Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails and error messages are displayed when invalid credentials are submitted.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username and/or password.
Submit the login form.
Verify the login page reloads with appropriate error messages.

title: Logout Functionality
description: Verify that logged-in users can logout and are redirected to the home page.

steps.description: Login as an admin or counselor user.
Trigger logout via logout link or URL.
Verify redirection to the landing page.
Verify the user session is terminated.

title: Counseling Appointment Booking Normal Flow
description: Verify students can confidentially book counseling appointments with valid input data.

steps.description: Navigate to the appointment booking page.
Fill in required fields: select counselor, choose appointment date/time.
Optionally provide a reason and session ID.
Submit the booking form.
Verify user is redirected or shown confirmation of successful booking.

title: Appointment Booking Validation Failures
description: Verify that booking form enforces required fields and reports errors when inputs are invalid or incomplete.

steps.description: Navigate to the appointment booking page.
Submit the form empty or with invalid date/time format.
Verify validation errors are displayed indicating missing or invalid fields.

title: Admin Appointment Management Access Control
description: Verify that only authenticated admin or counselor users can access the appointment management page.

steps.description: Attempt to navigate to '/appointments/manage/' as an unauthenticated user.
Verify redirection to login page occurs.
Login as a valid admin or counselor user.
Navigate to '/appointments/manage/'.
Verify the appointments management page loads with HTTP 200.

title: Update Appointment Status Validations
description: Verify appointment status updates work correctly with valid statuses and handle invalid inputs or permissions.

steps.description: Login as authorized user.
Send POST request to update appointment status with valid status values ('pending', 'confirmed', 'completed', 'cancelled').
Verify response status 200 indicates successful update.
Attempt to update appointment status with invalid status value.
Verify response status 400 indicates invalid input.
Attempt to update appointment status as unauthorized or unauthenticated user.
Verify response status 403 indicates permission denied.

title: Psychoeducational Resources Filtering
description: Verify resource page filters content correctly by type (video, meditation, article) and language (en, hi, ta, te, kn, mr).

steps.description: Navigate to resources page without filters.
Verify all resource types and languages are listed.
Apply filter by resource type 'video'.
Verify only video resources are displayed.
Apply filter by language 'hi' (Hindi).
Verify resources are filtered to type and language correctly.

title: Forum Post Creation and Moderation Workflow
description: Verify anonymous users can create forum posts which enter moderation queue, then admins can approve or delete them.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/forum/posts/ with valid title and content, optional session ID.
Verify response indicates post created successfully with pending moderation.
Login as admin user and access moderation queue.
Verify the newly created post appears in moderation queue.
Approve the post via API.
Verify post status updates and it becomes visible in forum.
Delete a post via API and verify it is removed.

title: Forum Reply Creation and Moderation
description: Verify anonymous users can reply to forum posts, replies enter moderation queue, admins can approve or delete replies.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/forum/posts/{post_id}/replies/ with valid reply content and optional session ID.
Verify reply creation succeeds with pending moderation.
Login as admin and access moderation queue.
Verify reply appears in moderation queue.
Approve the reply via API.
Verify reply becomes visible under the post.
Delete a reply and verify removal.

title: Forum Access and Content Visibility
description: Verify that only approved posts and replies are visible in the forum to anonymous users, and non-existent posts return 404.

steps.description: Access the forum page as a user.
Verify only approved posts are displayed.
Access a post detail page with approved post ID.
Verify post content and approved replies are displayed.
Access a post detail page with a non-existent post ID.
Verify a 404 not found response is returned.

title: Forum Moderation Access Control
description: Verify that only logged-in admins can access the forum moderation queue and perform approve/delete actions.

steps.description: Attempt to access /forum/moderate/ as an unauthenticated user.
Verify redirection to login page.
Login as a non-admin user and attempt to approve or delete forum content.
Verify permission denied (403) responses.
Login as admin user and access moderation queue.
Verify moderation page loads with HTTP 200.

title: Admin Dashboard Access and Data Accuracy
description: Verify that only authenticated admins/counselors can access the dashboard and the displayed analytics data is accurate and correctly formatted.

steps.description: Attempt to access the dashboard page without authentication.
Verify redirection to login page.
Login as a valid admin or counselor user.
Navigate to the dashboard page.
Verify the page loads successfully.
Call the /api/dashboard/stats/ endpoint.
Verify the JSON response contains total sessions, total appointments, pending appointments, unmoderated posts, and chart data arrays.
Verify chart data arrays have coherent length and valid content.

title: Multi-language Support in Resources
description: Verify psychoeducational resources are correctly served in multiple supported Indian languages and filtering works per language.

steps.description: Navigate to resources page with language filter set to each supported language (en, hi, ta, te, kn, mr) one by one.
Verify resources displayed correspond to the selected language.

title: Error Handling for Chat API Invalid Inputs
description: Verify that sending malformed or missing required fields in the chat API /api/chat/ POST request returns proper 400 errors.

steps.description: Send a POST request to /api/chat/ with empty JSON body.
Verify the response status is 400 Bad Request.
Send a POST request with message field missing or null.
Verify the response status is 400 Bad Request.

title: Error Handling for Appointment Status Update API
description: Verify that appointment update API returns 400 error for invalid status and 403 for unauthorized access.

steps.description: Login as authorized user and send POST to appointment update API with an invalid status value.
Verify response status is 400.
Send the same request without authentication.
Verify response status is 403 permission denied.

title: Forum API Error Handling for Non-existent Posts
description: Verify that replying to or fetching details of a non-existent forum post returns appropriate error responses.

steps.description: Send GET request to /forum/post/{invalid_post_id}/ where invalid_post_id does not exist.
Verify response status is 404 Not Found.
Send POST reply to /api/forum/posts/{invalid_post_id}/replies/ with valid content.
Verify response status is 404 Not Found.
